history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I'm going to CMU.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie mellon university?
USER right
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie mellon university?
USER No.
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to the airport.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yeah.
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER I'm leaving from CMU.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie mellon university?
USER right
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER I need to Mellon University.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie mellon university?
USER Ross
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to ross dress for less?
USER No.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to CMU.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie mellon university?
USER garage
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh parking authority?
USER garage
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh parking authority?
USER That's correct.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie mellon university?
USER right
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where are you leaving from?
USER I'm leaving from CMU.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie mellon university?
USER That's correct.
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:11 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
